title: Everything Is F_cked - A Book About Hope
author: Mark Manson
description: In this thought-provoking follow-up to The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck, Mark Manson explores the concept of hope and its significance in a world filled with chaos and uncertainty. Through a mix of personal anecdotes, philosophical insights, and practical advice, Manson delves into the deeper issues of modern life, challenging readers to rethink their relationship with hope and happiness.
